activities: Terra Dotta provides web-based software and database for the collection and processing of academic enrollment data.  The administrative end-users of the software may, at their own discretion and to serve their varied needs, collect and store personal information about students and others using the system. Said information is housed in the database for purposes of ready retrieval by administrative end-users for the processing of applications to programs of study or for information in in the event of crises.  The data may also be used by the client for statistical analysis.
personaldata: Standard elements include name, email and date of birth (optional), but may be extended by the administrative user to include indeterminate other data elements, at the organization's discretion.
recoursemech: Disputes that cannot be resolved after good faith discussions may be referred to the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program) for resolution by binding arbitration.
